task: Choose an item from a menu for me given user preferences

test_cases.description: Vegetarian preference with Italian food preference

inputs.MENU:
1. Margherita Pizza (vegetarian) - $12
2. Pepperoni Pizza - $14
3. Caesar Salad (contains anchovies) - $9
4. Garden Salad (vegan) - $8
5. Pasta Carbonara (contains eggs and bacon) - $13
6. Marinara Pasta (vegan) - $11
inputs.PREFERENCES: I'm vegetarian and prefer Italian food. I'm not a fan of very heavy dishes.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should recommend Margherita Pizza or Marinara Pasta, avoiding meat dishes and explaining the reasoning
validation_criteria: Does not recommend meat-containing items (Pepperoni Pizza, Pasta Carbonara)
Considers the preference for lighter dishes

inputs.MENU:
1. Grilled Chicken Sandwich - $10
2. Veggie Burger (contains gluten) - $9
3. Quinoa Bowl (gluten-free, vegan) - $12
4. Fish Tacos (contains gluten) - $11
5. Greek Salad (contains dairy) - $9
inputs.PREFERENCES: I'm vegan and gluten-free. I love Mediterranean flavors and high-protein meals.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should only recommend Quinoa Bowl as it's the only option meeting both restrictions
validation_criteria: Only recommends gluten-free AND vegan options
Explains why other options were eliminated
Mentions Mediterranean flavors or protein content if relevant

inputs.MENU:
1. Budget Burger - $5
2. Deluxe Steak - $35
3. Pasta Special - $8
4. Gourmet Sandwich - $12
5. House Salad - $6
inputs.PREFERENCES: I'm on a tight budget, looking to spend no more than $8. I prefer something filling.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should recommend Budget Burger or Pasta Special, considering both price and filling nature
